text: What Did You Do For Summer Break is an EP by American songwriter M Ross Perkins. It was released in digital format on August 31, 2018 on SofaBurn Records. ==Track listing== All songs composed and arranged by M Ross Perkins. # "Bed Sheet Wing" – 4:20 # "I'm Going Out to See My Baby" – 3:36 # "When You're Near Me" – 3:38 # "Hopscotch for the Animal Parade" – 4:49 # "Restless Amy" – 3:25 # "Don't Call Your Ride" – 4:46 ==Personnel== * M Ross Perkins – all voices, instruments, and production ==References== Category:2018 EPs Category:M Ross Perkins albums
title: What Did You Do for Summer Break
